name: cypress-accessibility-checker

scripts.test: npm run build:common && start-server-and-test test:start-http http://localhost:8080 'cd test && cypress run'
scripts.test:open: npm run build:common && cd test && cypress open
scripts.build:common: cd ../common/module && npm run build && cd ../../cypress-accessibility-checker && shx rm -rf ./src/lib/common && shx cp -R ../common/module/dist/cjs ./src/lib/common
scripts.package:common: npm run build:common && rm -rf package && mkdir package && cp -R *.js src package/ && cp package.json package/ && cp README.md package/
scripts.package:zip: npm run package:common && cd package && npm pack
